item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

The Management was so impressed with the size of group we had last time, let's show them what we the group can bring this time!!!!!

Monday 02/25/2013 week's location is:

Barcelona

Barcelona is a great tapas and wine bar in downtown New Haven.  Located on the corner of Temple and Crown streets, this classy joint has a wide selection of primarily Spanish Wine and Food.  The wine list, while not on special, is extensive.  The relaxed sexy bar atmosphere to the left as you enter features a "fire pit", which is the general vicinity we'll be in.

The Managers Tom and Hartin have generously offered us the following specials:

They plan to give each member One Complementary Glass of Sangria!, you will tell the bartender that you are with the meetup to get your free drink...(I've requested my fav bartender she may be brought in from Boston to help Justin out with out group)

There will be a selection of their most popular Tapas provided for our Sampling. Make sure to get there early enough to get them while they last!  Last time we got a tremendous amount of tapas and they plan on doing the same thing.....

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

I (Gail) will serve as the contact for this evening. You can try my Cell at 203-824-9869, texting is fine as well.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text Gail at 203-824-9869. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar, on the "Fire Pit" side.
